name: Man Of The Wild
description:
Controls :

  • WASD (movement)
  • Shift (run)
  • Space Bar (jump)
  • Mouse (aim)

Things i have planned

  • Fighting. 
  • Better grass.
  • Better settings.
  • Story.
  • NPCs.
  • Customization.

So it definitely is a work in progress.

Version 0. (First test build)

  • Works on Windows, Mac and Linux.
  • Complete with features such as
    • Player
    • Mountain climbing (mostly due to physics bugs though. We'll call it a feature though)
    • Day night cycle
    • Ugly grass
    • Breathtaking terrain
    • Settings, very limited for now but will be expanded upon later
  • Current control schemes: Keyboard and mouse, but due to how i did it, i can add controller support in an instant.
